qualities.name: Return on Investment
qualities.description: The interest is the Return on Investment (ROI) [%] between the initial investment cost and the net life cycle earnings.

qualities.name: Life Cycle earnings
qualities.description: The life cycle earnings is the total earnings of its income over the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Life Time
qualities.description: The lifetime is the total expected lifespan of the building, expressed in years.

qualities.name: Income per Year
qualities.description: The income per year is the total income generated by the building per year.

qualities.name: Initial Investment
qualities.description: The initial investment is the total cost to construct the building.

qualities.name: Building Construction Costs
qualities.description: The total cost of the building construction.

qualities.name: Technical Equipment Costs
qualities.description: The total cost of the technical equipment needed for the building.

qualities.name: Life Cycle Costs
qualities.description: The total cost during the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Operating Costs
qualities.description: The total operating costs during the life cycle of the building.

qualities.name: Operating Expenses
qualities.description: The operating expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Maintenance Expenses
qualities.description: The maintenance expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Energy Expenses
qualities.description: The energy expenses during one year.

qualities.name: Heating Expenses
qualities.description: The heating expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Electricity Expenses
qualities.description: The electricity expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Expenses
qualities.description: The ventilation expenses over a year.

qualities.name: Heating Costs
qualities.description: The heating costs are the product of the final heating energy demand and heating energy price over a year.

qualities.name: Final Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final heating energy demand is the heating energy demand multiplied with the heating efficiency factor of one year.

qualities.name: Heating Efficiency Factor
qualities.description: The efficiency factor for the heating system.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for heating the building.

qualities.name: Transmission Heat Loss
qualities.description: The heat loss due to transmission through the building envelope per year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Heat Loss
qualities.description: The heat loss due to ventilation in the building over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Heat Recovery Factor
qualities.description: The factor representing the proportion of heat recovered from ventilation.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of heating energy.

qualities.name: Heating CO2 Price
qualities.description: The heating CO2 price is the product of heating global warming potential and CO2 price per year.

qualities.name: Heating Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The heating global warming potential is the product of final heating energy demand and heating global warming potential factor.

qualities.name: Heating Global Warming Potential Factor
qualities.description: The global warming potential factor per unit of heating energy.

qualities.name: CO2 Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of CO2 emissions.

qualities.name: Electricity Costs
qualities.description: The electricity costs are the product of the electricity energy demand and electricity energy price for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for electricity in the building per year.

qualities.name: Technical Equipment Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand of the technical equipment in the building for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Energy Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of electricity energy.

qualities.name: Electricity CO2 Price
qualities.description: The electricity CO2 price is the product of electricity global warming potential and CO2 price per year.

qualities.name: Electricity Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The electricity global warming potential is the product of electricity energy demand and electricity global warming potential factor per year.

qualities.name: Electricity Global Warming Potential Factor
qualities.description: The global warming potential factor per unit of electricity energy.

qualities.name: Ventilation Costs
qualities.description: The ventilation costs are the product of final ventilation energy demand and electricity energy price per year.

qualities.name: Final Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final ventilation energy demand is the product of ventilation efficiency factor and ventilation energy demand for one year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Efficiency Factor
qualities.description: The efficiency factor for the ventilation system.

qualities.name: Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The energy demand for ventilation in the building over a year.

qualities.name: Ventilation CO2 Price
qualities.description: The CO2 price for ventilation are the costs associated with the carbon emissions from the ventilation system, which is the electricity-CO2-Price because the ventilation system runs with electricity.

qualities.name: Ventilation Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The ventilation global warming potential is the product of ventilation energy demand and electricity global warming potential factor for one year.

qualities.name: Life Cycle Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The life cycle global warming potential is the total greenhouse gas emissions associated with the life cycle of the whole building.

qualities.name: Energy Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The energy global warming potential is the total greenhouse gas emissions associated with the energy consumption of the whole building over a year.

qualities.name: Construction Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The construction global warming potential is the total greenhouse gas emissions associated with the construction of the whole building.

qualities.name: Building Construction Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The building construction global warming potential is the total greenhouse gas emissions associated with the construction of the building.

qualities.name: Technical Equipment Global Warming Potential
qualities.description: The technical equipment global warming potential is the total greenhouse gas emissions associated with the technical equipment of the building.

qualities.name: Final Energy Demand
qualities.description: The final energy demand is the total energy demand of the building per year, including all energy carriers.

qualities.name: Primary Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary energy demand is the total primary energy demand of the building per year, including all energy carriers.

qualities.name: Primary Heating Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary heating energy demand is the product of final heating energy demand and heating primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Heating Primary Energy Factor
qualities.description: The primary energy factor for the heating system.

qualities.name: Primary Electricity Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary electricity energy demand is the product of electricity energy demand and electricity primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Electricity Primary Energy Factor
qualities.description: The primary energy factor for electricity.

qualities.name: Primary Ventilation Energy Demand
qualities.description: The primary ventilation energy demand is the product of final ventilation energy demand and electricity primary energy factor for one year.

qualities.name: Floor Area
qualities.description: The total floor area of the building.

qualities.name: Effective Floor Area
qualities.description: The effective usable floor area of the building.

qualities.name: Area Efficiency
qualities.description: The ratio of effective floor area to total floor area.

qualities.name: Gross Volume
qualities.description: The total gross volume of the building.

qualities.name: Net Volume
qualities.description: The net volume of the building interior.

qualities.name: Volume Efficiency
qualities.description: The ratio of net volume to gross volume.

qualities.name: Envelope Area
qualities.description: The total area of the building envelope.

qualities.name: Window Area
qualities.description: The total area of windows in the building.

qualities.name: Wall Area
qualities.description: The total area of exterior walls.

qualities.name: Roof Area
qualities.description: The total area of the roof.

qualities.name: Window-to-Wall Ratio
qualities.description: The ratio of window area to wall area.

qualities.name: Surface-to-Volume Ratio
qualities.description: The ratio of envelope area to gross volume.

qualities.name: Wall U-Value
qualities.description: The thermal transmittance of the exterior walls.

qualities.name: Window U-Value
qualities.description: The thermal transmittance of the windows.

qualities.name: Roof U-Value
qualities.description: The thermal transmittance of the roof.

qualities.name: Window G-Value
qualities.description: The solar heat gain coefficient of the windows.

qualities.name: Average Envelope U-Value
qualities.description: The area-weighted average U-value of the building envelope.
qualities.formula: Divide ( Add ( Multiply ( semio.envelope.u-value-wall semio.area.wall-area ) Multiply ( semio.envelope.u-value-window semio.area.window-area ) Multiply ( semio.envelope.u-value-roof semio.area.roof-area ) ) semio.area.envelope-area )

qualities.name: Transmission Heat Losses
qualities.description: The heat losses through the building envelope due to transmission.

qualities.name: Heating System Efficiency
qualities.description: The efficiency of the heating system.

qualities.name: Ventilation System Efficiency
qualities.description: The efficiency of the ventilation system.

qualities.name: Heat Recovery Efficiency
qualities.description: The efficiency of the heat recovery system.

qualities.name: Overall System Efficiency
qualities.description: The combined efficiency of heating and ventilation systems.

qualities.name: Useful Energy Output
qualities.description: The useful energy delivered by the systems.

qualities.name: Outdoor Temperature
qualities.description: The average outdoor temperature.

qualities.name: Indoor Temperature
qualities.description: The desired indoor temperature.

qualities.name: Heating Degree Days
qualities.description: The number of heating degree days for the location.

qualities.name: Cooling Degree Days
qualities.description: The number of cooling degree days for the location.

qualities.name: Space Heating Demand
qualities.description: The space heating energy demand of the building.

qualities.name: Space Cooling Demand
qualities.description: The space cooling energy demand of the building.

qualities.name: Domestic Hot Water Demand
qualities.description: The domestic hot water energy demand.

qualities.name: Lighting Energy Demand
qualities.description: The lighting energy demand of the building.

qualities.name: Equipment Energy Demand
qualities.description: The equipment energy demand of the building.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Intensity
qualities.description: The heating energy intensity per floor area.

qualities.name: Cooling Energy Intensity
qualities.description: The cooling energy intensity per floor area.

qualities.name: Electricity Energy Intensity
qualities.description: The electricity energy intensity per floor area.

qualities.name: Concrete Volume
qualities.description: The total volume of concrete used in construction.

qualities.name: Steel Mass
qualities.description: The total mass of steel used in construction.

qualities.name: Insulation Thickness
qualities.description: The thickness of thermal insulation.

qualities.name: Window Type
qualities.description: The type of windows used (single, double, triple glazing).

qualities.name: Land Cost
qualities.description: The cost of land acquisition.

qualities.name: Planning Cost
qualities.description: The cost of architectural and engineering planning.

qualities.name: Maintenance Cost
qualities.description: The annual maintenance costs.

qualities.name: Cleaning Cost
qualities.description: The annual cleaning costs.

qualities.name: Insurance Cost
qualities.description: The annual insurance costs.

qualities.name: Heating Energy Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of heating energy.

qualities.name: Electricity Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of electricity.

qualities.name: Gas Price
qualities.description: The price per unit of gas energy.

qualities.name: Solar Energy Potential
qualities.description: The potential solar energy generation on the building.

qualities.name: Geothermal Energy Potential
qualities.description: The potential geothermal energy for heating and cooling.

qualities.name: Internal Heat Gains
qualities.description: The internal heat gains from occupants and equipment.

qualities.name: Solar Heat Gains
qualities.description: The solar heat gains through windows and building envelope.

qualities.name: Energy Efficiency Ratio
qualities.description: The ratio of useful energy output to energy input.

qualities.name: Cost Effectiveness
qualities.description: The ratio of benefits to costs over the building lifecycle.

qualities.name: Carbon Intensity
qualities.description: The carbon emissions per unit floor area.

qualities.name: Energy Cost Ratio
qualities.description: The ratio of energy costs to total operating costs.

qualities.name: Simple Payback Period
qualities.description: The time to recover the initial investment through savings.

qualities.name: Occupant Density
qualities.description: The number of occupants per unit floor area.

qualities.name: Usage Hours
qualities.description: The number of hours the building is in use per year.

qualities.name: Ventilation Rate
qualities.description: The required fresh air ventilation rate per person.
